org.ghost4j

Class AbstractRemoteComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ghost4j.AbstractComponent
      • org.ghost4j.AbstractRemoteComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRemoteAnalyzer, AbstractRemoteConverter, AbstractRemoteRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractRemoteComponent
extends AbstractComponent
    Abstract remote converter component. Used as base class for remote components.
    Author:
    Gilles Grousset (gi.grousset@gmail.com)
